lemma: Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you
context1: LOVE AND PRAYERS FOR ENEMIES[Jesus said:] "But I tell you: Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you."
context2: " love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you;"Many have come to the saving knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ by not what way say, but how we act.

lemma: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me
context1: Don't be discouraged by any challenges you may face! "I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me". Keep working towards your goals! 😍📍
context2: "I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me." The power to overcome my sin and mistakes are through Jesus Christ.

lemma: Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you

lemma: Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you
context1: I LOVE MY ENEMIES FOR TWO REASONS: THEY INSPIRE ME TO RECOGNIZE MY ENEMIES, THEY ALSO INSPIRE ME TO RESPECT MY IMPERFECT NATURE. "BUT I SAY TO YOU, LOVE YOUR ENEMIES AND PRAY FOR THOSE WHO PERSECUTE YOU"

lemma: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me
context1: life doesn't get any easier to deal with, but my faith has kept me stronger than I have ever imagined, I still sob, and I still get tired, but- for I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me

lemma: Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you
context1: "Love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you." Rise above animosity. Loving our enemies and doing good to those who hate us is a radical act. It's not easy, it's transformative.
context2: In Matthew 5:44, Jesus teaches his followers to "love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you." But i guess its okay to do the opposite as long as those who we kill are evil, or we are God...
